resources.string: After added one of the plugins and created the associated account, you can search contacts by name, email or phone number.

Touching photo enable quick use for selected contact.
Touching contact name enable to view it

To avoid memory exhaustivity, contacts are stored in memory only until next synchronization. You can store them inside phone, by importing from contact details view, or from quick use on contact photo. Then, there're automatically synchronized.
No extension found to add an account.\nTo find one in Google Play, click here.

No account found.

To add an account, press Menu and touch:


Accounts to add or configure an account providing contacts you can sync to the phone.


Extensions to add modules for a new type of directory.

To search for a contact, press Menu and touch:


Search to enter a name, a phone number or an email.


Imports to connect internal contact with remote accounts.


Extensions to add modules for a new type of directory.
Enter a name, email, phone number and any other comma-separated information (Town, Country, etc…)
